reviewText: This is a really cute, although somewhat dated, musical. I enjoyed the way it brings the story of Purim to life. A  nice addition to your Purim celebration for adults and children alike.

The music is great.  Melodies are memorable and hummable.  The Yiddish accents of the actors takes a bit of getting used to (it is slightly different from the eastern European Yiddish in which I am extremely fluent).  As whole, The Megilla is extremely enjoyable.
